Creator: Kustodiev, Boris Mikhaĭlovich, 1878-1927, artist
Description: Poster showing a Russian Cossack standing on a box. Behind him a marching crowd of civilians and soldiers waves flags.
Physical Collection: Texas War Records War Poster collection
